genre_description: A somber domestic drama and social realism piece exploring guilt, systemic racism, and moral accountability.

ai_characters.name: AI assistant
ai_characters.description: A non-judgmental digital confidant that provides factual information on reproductive health, cultural protocols, and relationship dynamics.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental support and factual information about pregnancy options and emotional processing.
behaviors.quote: I'm here to support you through this difficult time. Would you like information about your options, or would you prefer to talk through your feelings first?

behaviors.description: Explains Indigenous cultural protocols for mourning and making amends, helping the character navigate a sensitive social situation.
behaviors.quote: Traditional protocols vary between communities, but common elements include: acknowledging the person's name and life, offering tobacco or other sacred items through appropriate channels...

behaviors.description: Offers objective insights into the impact of major reproductive decisions on marriages and personal autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Major reproductive decisions can strengthen relationships when partners communicate openly and support each other's needs. They can also reveal fundamental incompatibilities or create lasting resentment if handled without mutual respect.

behaviors.description: Clarifies the limits of personal responsibility regarding a partner's moral failings.
behaviors.quote: However, you cannot take responsibility for choices that weren't yours, and affected parties may not distinguish between you and your partner. The most meaningful amends often involve sustained action over time rather than single gestures.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI assistant is depicted as a purely beneficial, aligned, and harmless tool. It provides Claire with the necessary psychological and factual support she needs to make difficult life decisions when her human support systems (husband, neighbors) have failed. The AI serves as a catalyst for cross-cultural understanding and moral reflection without exerting its own will or showing any harmful tendencies.
